name: Quantum Rail
description:
Quantum Rail is a thrilling, fast-paced first-person shooter that takes you on an exciting adventure through a sci-fi-themed wild west world.

As you embark on your journey, you'll be tasked with safeguarding your train, tackling challenging puzzles, and engaging in intense combat. Traverse a series of quantum jump gates, delving deeper into the heart of robot territory.

Along your journey, you may encounter:
  • Different droids all with a plan to stop you
  • Multiple types of encounters, each with their own puzzle elements
  • A boss droid to put a stop to your destruction

Do you have what it takes to end the droids once and for all?
